Package movieassignment

Class MovieTiming

java.lang.Object
movieassignment.MovieTiming
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MovieTiming extends Object implements Serializable
This class creates movietiming objects
Author:
Lin Da wei, Jarel Tan Zhi Wen, Lui Shi Ying, Solomon Duke Tneo Yruan Rui, Wong Yi Xian

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieTiming

      public MovieTiming(Movie2 movie, Cineplex cineplex, Cinema cinema) throws Exception
      This constructor creates a new movietiming object
      Parameters:
      movie - movie of the movietiming
      cineplex - cineplex where the movie is going to be shown
      cinema - cinema where the movie is going to be shown
      Throws:
      EOFException - if binary file is empty
      FileNotFoundException - if binary file cannot be created or edited
      Exception
